short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage tab groups and saved windows efficiently.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why Choose This Extension?

Boost Your Productivity🎯:
Switch between projects or workspaces seamlessly by saving and restoring tabs with a single click.

Save Time⏰:
Reopen your saved tabs and windows instantly, avoiding the hassle of searching or setting them up again.

Enhance Your Browsing Experience💻:
Keep important tabs for later while reducing distractions, ensuring a smooth, focused session.

Never Lose Your Progress📂:
Protect your tabs from accidental closure, crashes, or reboots by saving entire browsing sessions.

Organize Your Workflow📝:
Customize and categorize saved tabs and windows to match your needs, making them easy to find and use.

Privacy First:
Your saved data stays on your device—no sharing, no risks.

Stay Organized:
Group and save your tabs effortlessly—no more cluttered browsers or lost tabs.

Perfect for Everyone:
Whether you're a professional managing tasks, a student researching, or someone keeping track of personal interests, this tool adapts to your needs.

💡 Transform how you browse! Install the extension now to save time, stay organized, and supercharge your productivity.
